dcterms:creator: Samuel R. Bowman
Gabor Angeli
Christopher Potts
Christopher D. Manning
dcterms:description: A collection of 570k human-written English sentence pairs supporting the task of natural language inference. The task is to predict whether a premise sentence entails the hypothesis, contradicts the hypothesis, or neither.
dcterms:title: SNLI (Stanford Natural Language Inference Corpus)

dcterms:creator: Adina Williams
Nikita Nangia
Samuel R. Bowman
dcterms:description: A crowd-sourced collection of 433k sentence pairs annotated with textual entailment information, covering various genres including transcribed speech, fiction, and government reports.
dcterms:title: MNLI (Multi-Genre Natural Language Inference)

dcterms:creator: Pranav Rajpurkar
Jian Zhang
Konstantin Lopyrev
Percy Liang
dcterms:description: A dataset converted from the Stanford Question Answering Dataset (SQuAD), containing question-paragraph pairs where one of the sentences in the paragraph contains the answer to the corresponding question.
dcterms:title: QNLI (Question-Answering Natural Language Inference)

dcterms:creator: Zhen Wang
Amapreet Singh
Julian Michael
Felix Hill
Omer Levy
Samuel R. Bowman
dcterms:description: A collection of question pairs from the Quora community, used for paraphrase detection.
dcterms:title: Quora Question Pairs (QQP)
